name: China Environmental Fund
overview:
CEF has three funds managed by Tsing Capital: CEF I (2002), CEF II (2004) and CEF III. CEF I, the first professionally managed offshore fund specializing in the environmental protection sector in China. CEF II and continuing with CEF III together have US$ 300 million under management, and continue the dedicated focus on China cleantech investment.

CEF has been keeping at the forefront of the changing cleantech investment in China, starting with traditional environmental protection, to cleaning the air, to energy savings, to renewable and to the current broad concept of cleantech. Recognizing our leadership position, key international and Chinese organizations have invited CEF to major cleantech events such as:

â— World Bank/IMF Annual Board of Governors Conferences â— Cleantech Forums in North America, Europe and Asia â— IFC 50th Anniversary Conference in Washington, DC. â— US-China Green Energy Conferences
